channel.title: John Carmack from id Software joins Oculus VR
channel.description:
Last week John Carmack from id Software joined Oculus VR as their Chief Technical Officer.
[url='https://blogs.dallasobserver.com/mixmaster/2013/08/last_week_oculus_vr_announced.php']https://blogs.dallasobserver.com/mixmaster/2013/08/last_week_oculus_vr_announced.php[/url]
Enjoy.

item.title: John Carmack from id Software joins Oculus VR
item.dc:creator: Dadster
item.description:
It’s all spelled out in the article.

Read full topic

item.title: John Carmack from id Software joins Oculus VR
item.dc:creator: Jack_Freeman
item.description:
Yeah, I think he said that he would still work at Id, but just much less than he used to.

Read full topic
item.source: John Carmack from id Software joins Oculus VR

item.title: John Carmack from id Software joins Oculus VR
item.dc:creator: Maxey
item.description:
Carmack hasn’t left id software btw. In fact, he’s dividing his time between id, Armadillo Aerospace and Oculus.

Read full topic
item.source: John Carmack from id Software joins Oculus VR

item.title: John Carmack from id Software joins Oculus VR
item.dc:creator: Ronster
item.description:
woah that is a big kick in the nuts… But time to move on to pastures new… Doom 4 will be ok on ID TECH 5 it’s just later on down the line will the engine fade into dust and not keep cutting edge.

Read full topic
item.source: John Carmack from id Software joins Oculus VR

item.title: John Carmack from id Software joins Oculus VR
item.dc:creator: Surplus
item.description:
Borderlands wasn’t even remotely the same kind of game as rage. Rage was actually a shooter where as Borderlands was a loot collection game with guns you happened to shoot.

Read full topic
item.source: John Carmack from id Software joins Oculus VR

item.title: John Carmack from id Software joins Oculus VR
item.dc:creator: Dotard
item.description:
Cool, the guy has a brain. I don’t think Id Software has a bright future ahead of them. Borderlands pwned Rage, Doom 4 nowhere to be seen… nothing impressive from them since Doom 3.

Read full topic
